mapper.select: SELECT mgrs_id as id, mgrs_name as name, mgrs_pwd as password FROM CMMN_MEMBER_MANAGER WHERE mgrs_id = #{id}

select count(*) over() as totalCount, mgrs_id, mgrs_name, mgrs_telno, mgrs_permityn, convert(varchar(10), mgrs_register_pnttm, 120) as mgrs_register_pnttm from CMMN_MEMBER_MANAGER ORDER BY mgrs_code DESC OFFSET ((#{currentPage}-1) * #{rowsPerPage}) ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
